header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Family, work, sign language classes, babies, diet, TV
header.activity: Mother and daughter chatting over coffee.

body.u: so your dad rang a couple of hours ago and erm
got there alright then?

yes he texted me last night probably about half eleven to say they were there but what I didn't realise is they are not actually on the site they are at the docks where the pipes were delivered and they've got to erm sort out six hundred pipes clean them all out and put end caps on them because the customer won't pay
mm how long is that going to take himthen?

well your dad said it's horrendous it's going to take forever he says they haven't got end caps for a start they've been nicked or they've fallen off or they didn't come with them which is a problem that we always used to have erm there's a big box of like rubber end caps but they can't make them fit so your dad had gone out to get more calor gas from a local shop because they are using like a a Canusa type torch to melt down the rubber to try and get it to stick onto the pipe so
oh mm mm mm excellent

almost like welding it on an and I don't know wha he says it's absolutely awful he said it was quite a nice day up there so I don't think they've had the rain that we had here luckily but he says erm the customer wants to take eight pipes next week he said but er of course we can't they can't leave the docks until the customer pays the Vat I said well of course they can't and the Vat is two hundred and thirty thousand on that first lot apparently there's six more deliveries coming in next well in ten days' time and they won't be able to shift these so no wonder he's got like a a small posse of people up there on site
it was lovely up there yesterday mm mm so they'll probably never get onto site then in the next couple of days he's just taken them up to do this

well yeah once they do get on to site that's when they need somebody else there to record the delivery notes correctly I mean we never had to do this before this this is this is just stalling tactics for not paying I can't
oh

you may worry that teaching your baby to sign will slow down his normal speech development in fact research shows the opposite is true signing may actually help your baby to learn to talk adding words to his vocabulary signing is about enhancing not replacing language signing should be used along with normal speech so your baby can make the link between gesture and words yes so when you are at home you won't you won't just communicate with your baby because without saying anything
yes why? has what? yes that's beer anyway

oh if for example he tells you he can hear an aeroplane you can respond you hear an aeroplane yes I can see it look it's over there it's in the cloud this way you spend more time chatting about what interests your little one which is a great way to help to him learn to talk there we go
